The foundation of this port on the Gulf of Calvi in Haute-Corse dates back to antiquity, located on the edge of the lower town and at the foot of the present-day Calvi citadel (from the XIIIᵉ century).

The Port Xavier Colonna is a real economic lung for the town, welcoming thousands of yachtsmen and confirming its appeal as a tourist attraction.
